name: Night Stalker
title: Balanar
lore: Balanar hunts only at night, when his power is at its peak. During the day, he waits in darkness.

void_ns.name: Void
void_ns.description: Deals damage and slows. At night, ministuns and slows for longer.

cripplingFear.name: Crippling Fear
cripplingFear.description: Silences enemies in an area. At night, the duration is longer.

hunterInTheNight.name: Hunter in the Night
hunterInTheNight.description: Night Stalker gains bonus attack speed and movement speed at night.

darkAscension.name: Dark Ascension
darkAscension.description: Night Stalker transforms, gaining flying movement and turning day into night.

15: +40 Hunter in the Night Attack Speed
